system.description: You can channel your full strength into crushing all-out attacks that penetrate armor and stun your opponents with devastating concussive force.
system.benefit: Whenever a character makes an All Out Attack Action to make a single melee attack, they may add half their Strength Bonus to the weapon's Penetration value. Additionally, the attack counts as having Concussive(2) Special Quality. Concussive(2): Target makes -20 Toughness Test, failure stuns for 1 round per degree of failure. If damage is greater than Target's Strength bonus, knock them prone.

combat.condition: Add half Strength Bonus to Penetration during All Out Attack (melee)

specialAbilities.name: Concussive Attack
specialAbilities.description: All Out Attacks gain Concussive(2): Target makes -20 T Test, failure stuns 1 round/DoF. Damage > target's SB knocks prone.
